verses.verse: The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4427>reigneth;<s%> let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7264>tremble:<s%> he <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> between the <S%H3742>cherubims;<s%> let the <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H5120>moved.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
Let them <S%H3034>praise<s%> thy <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H8034>name;<s%> for <S%H1931>it<s%> is <S%H6918>holy.<s%>
Exalt <S%H7311><s%> ye the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> at his <S%H1916>footstool;<s%> <S%H7272><s%> for <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H6918>holy.<s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> among his <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> among them that call <S%H7121>upon<s%> his <S%H8034>name;<s%> they <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> them.

He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them in the <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> <S%H5982>pillar:<s%> they <S%H8104>kept<s%> his <S%H5713>testimonies,<s%> and the <S%H2706>ordinance<s%> that he <S%H5414>gave<s%> them.

Thou <S%H6030>answeredst<s%> them, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1961>wast<s%> a <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H5375>forgavest<s%> them, though thou tookest <S%H5358>vengeance<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> their <S%H5949>inventions.<s%>

Exalt <S%H7311><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> at his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H6918>holy.<s%>
